articles.title: About this site and me
articles.description: Some additional details about the website
articles.contents:
LLoRR Stats
          
          
          Home
          MetaReport
          MatchUps
          
          
          Other
           
          ▾
          
          
          Analysis
          Tools
          
          
          About
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              About this site and me
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        RPubs
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            Everything is collected with Riot’s API. It’s still a development key so the amount of data I can scrap is quite limited.
            All data is assumed to be almost always from players at Master ranks. When a new player is added to the leaderboard I start searching their match-history, since the Riot API return the last 20 matches without any other metadata of a match, initially I may recover some matches from Diamond too, but from that point onward those games are in Master ranks.
            All results are aimed at Master rank: play rate and win rate are relative to the reference population and results at lower ranks may differ. For Plat+ Kozmic and Dr.Lor provide better (and more consolidated) data.
            At the start of a season I may recover all games played at Master but once my rate-limit is less than the average number of games played, my approach is to extract a random sample of games played in the current patch. I won’t give priority to the most recent games or I may easily create bias in the sample.
            
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              About this site and me
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      Twitter
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      RPubs
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      Email

              All data is assumed to be almost always from players at Master ranks. When a new player is added to the leaderboard I start searching their match-history, since the Riot API return the last 20 matches without any other metadata of a match, initially I may recover some matches from Diamond too, but from that point onward those games are in Master ranks.
              All results are aimed at Master rank: play rate and win rate are relative to the reference population and results at lower ranks may differ. For Plat+ Kozmic and Dr.Lor provide better (and more consolidated) data.
              At the start of a season I may recover all games played at Master but once my rate-limit is less than the average number of games played, my approach is to extract a random sample of games played in the current patch. I won’t give priority to the most recent games or I may easily create bias in the sample.

articles.title: (Legna’s) Legends of Runeterra Stats (with R)
articles.description: Important: There is global problem regarding the Riot-API (also affecting LoL) where it's not possible to collect most (almost all) recent games. In the case of all Masters players there is just no new games that's updated after a certain threshold. While I can currently search at random for some games just to have some current-patch values, it wouldn't a representation of the Master ladder which is my core popular. Heck, I wouldn't even be able to tell what I'm actually analyzing and this would be wrong on so many levels. So, sorry if I can provide data as I would, once there are updates I'll update (and tweet) as soon as possible
